definition: to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)

sentences.english: Even the heat-draining method was developed into qi-blood and triple burner patterns.
sentences.chinese: 以气分血分及上中下三焦划分泻热法，等等。

sentences.english: Down came the long brown waves!
sentences.chinese: 那长长的褐色波浪泻了下来。

sentences.english: Star Stream convinces diarrhea, candle-yao Qu nine people.
sentences.chinese: 星流中使泻，烛耀九衢人。

sentences.english: Influence of previously ingested wheat on fasting breath hydrogen in celiac patients.
sentences.chinese: 食用小麦对乳糜泻患者禁食呼氢试验的影响。

sentences.english: You need to get laid, man.
sentences.chinese: 你需要找个女孩泻泻火了，伙计。

sentences.english: Objective to evaluate the clinical effect of Longdan Xiegan decoction modified fast treating sudden-onset herpes zoster.
sentences.chinese: 目的临床龙胆泻肝汤加减速治带状疱疹的疗效。

sentences.english: The mud brick of the burning temple cascaded over them.
sentences.chinese: 燃烧的神殿泥砖就泻在他们身上。

sentences.english: Gentiana scabra bge the plant to have alleviates fever eliminating dampness, flows swiftly the liver to decide the startled function.

sentences.english: More shells are passing over our heads on their way to blast the enemy positions than are coming our way .
sentences.chinese: 炮弹掠过头顶泻向敌人阵地，敌方的火力没有我方强。

sentences.english: The moon sheds her liquid light silently over the leaves and flowers.
sentences.chinese: 月光如流水一般，静静地泻在这一片叶子和花上。

sentences.english: Time flies pinned by a beat, our tears once again spilled the gate.
sentences.chinese: 拌着时间飞逝的心跳声，我们的泪水再次泻了闸。

definition: to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce
to relieve oedema through purging or diuresis (Chinese medicine)
to obstruct/to stop up/to heap soil around the roots of a plant
